description_top: Masāʾil fī al-ṭibb lil-mutaʻallimīn (Hebrew translation from the Arabic by Moshe Ibn Tibbon under the title: Sefer ha-Mavoʼ la-Malʼakhat ha-Refuʼot ʻal derekh ha-Sheʼelah ṿeha-Maʻaneh)
title: Masāʾil fī al-ṭibb lil-mutaʻallimīn (Hebrew translation from the Arabic by Moshe Ibn Tibbon under the title: Sefer ha-Mavoʼ la-Malʼakhat ha-Refuʼot ʻal derekh ha-Sheʼelah ṿeha-Maʻaneh)
author: Ḥunayn ibn Isḥāq al-ʻIbādī
